alert.note: Alert for Carter; Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 10:55PM CST until March 06 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carter County in southeastern Missouri... Western Ripley County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1055 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Eminence to 6 miles southeast of Birch Tree to 11 miles west of Thayer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Fremont around 1115 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Van Buren and Handy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Missouri.
